Message:
I returned to the mansion
to tell Stella what I’d found out,
but...

“On the Holy Night,
confess your love under
the large tree in the town square.
Then, the love you seek
will be yours.”

That seemed to be the true nature
of the Holy Night’s miracle.

My master even wrote,
“Feel free to use this
as a reference when you confess.”

N-No, that’s not what
I was planning to do!

Besides, Mister Apprentice and I
are master and apprentice,
so it’s much too soon
for that kind of thing—
or rather, it’s not like that at all!

A-Anyway, I’m just glad I got to
the bottom of this Holy Night’s
miracle mystery! Yeah!

Um...so,
where did Stella run off to?

I heard she was talking
to Gil’uial earlier, but...

...Ahh!
Why in the world is snow
falling on me indoors?!
